body_html:
Using std::isnan causes a runtime crash on a CUDA build with nvcc — I've tried that before. I can't reproduce your failure (maybe it is compiler version dependent).

Can you try using Eigen::numext::half for me? Does that compile for you?
body_text:
Using std::isnan causes a runtime crash on a CUDA build with nvcc — I've tried that before. I can't reproduce your failure (maybe it is compiler version dependent).
Can you try using Eigen::numext::half for me? Does that compile for you?
body:
Using std::isnan causes a runtime crash on a CUDA build with nvcc — I've tried that before. I can't reproduce your failure (maybe it is compiler version dependent).

Can you try using Eigen::numext::half for me? Does that compile for you?
